name: remove_duplicates
_description: Removes duplicate rows based on Patient ID, Parity, and Gravidity. This ensures each unique birth event is considered once.

name: containswords_result_exists
_description: Flags if blood cultures were taken. Checks 'blood cultures-test type_1' for the word 'דם' (blood) across 40 batches, with a step size of 4 columns.

name: containswords_and_nonempty_result_values
_description: Extracts detected organisms from blood cultures if 'דם' is present in the test type. Collects non-empty organism names.

name: containswords_and_nonempty_result_values
_description: Categorizes detected organisms from blood cultures based on a predefined dictionary. Collects non-empty organism categories.

name: remove_contaminant_and_count
_description: Processes blood culture organism categories: removes 'Contaminants (CONS etc.)' and counts remaining elements (0, 1, or 2+).

name: does_column_contain_string_in_category_list
_description: Flags if blood culture organisms include 'Contaminants (CONS etc.)'.

name: does_column_contain_string_in_category_list
_description: Flags if blood culture organisms include 'Non-hemolitic Strep'.

name: does_column_contain_string_in_category_list
_description: Flags if blood culture organisms include 'Enterobacterales'.

_description: Flags if blood culture organisms include 'Anaerobes'.

_description: Flags if blood culture organisms include 'Other Gram Negatives'.

name: does_column_contain_string_in_category_list
_description: Flags if blood culture organisms include 'Vaginal Flora'.

name: does_column_contain_string_in_category_list
_description: Flags if blood culture organisms include 'Staph Aureus'.

name: does_column_contain_string_in_category_list
_description: Flags if blood culture organisms include 'Listeria'.

name: does_column_contain_string_in_category_list
_description: Flags if blood culture organisms include 'Other' or 'Uncategorized'.

name: containswords_result_exists
_description: Flags if abscess cultures were taken. Checks 'other cultures-specimen material_1' for 'מורסה' or 'פצע' across 13 batches.

name: process_other_cultures
_description: Processes other cultures data, extracting samples, organisms, and categorizing them based on specimen material keywords ('מורסה', 'פצע').

name: remove_contaminant_and_count
_description: Processes abscess culture organism categories: removes 'Contaminants (CONS etc.)' and counts remaining elements (0, 1, or 2+).

name: containswords_result_exists

_description: Flags if Amoxycillin or Augmentin was given.

name: containswords_result_exists

name: create_column_from_value_map
_description: Creates 'Multifetal pregnancy_yes_or_no' column: 1 for multiple fetuses (2 or 3), 0 for single (1).

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'NVD_yes_or_no' as 1 if 'cs info-main indication' is empty (indicating Normal Vaginal Delivery), else 0.

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'CS_yes_or_no' as 1 if 'cs info-main indication' is NOT empty (indicating Cesarean Section), else 0.

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'vacuume_yes_or_no' as 1 if 'vacuum_diagnosis' is not empty (indicating vacuum delivery), else 0.

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'forceps_yes_or_no' as 1 if 'forceps_diagnosis' is not empty (indicating forceps delivery), else 0.

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'Intrapartum_fever_yes_or_no' as 1 if 'fever_max 38-43 before delivery-numeric result' is not empty (indicating fever), else 0.

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'Postpartum_fever_yes_or_no' as 1 if 'fever_max 38-43 after delivery-numeric result' is not empty (indicating fever), else 0.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'type of labor onset' based on keywords into predefined numerical categories (1-6) or 'Other'.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'Spontaneous_delivery_yes/no' as 1 if 'type of labor onset' is category 1 (Spontaneous), else 0.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'complications-value textual' into 0 (No) or 1 (Yes) based on keywords.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'amniofusion-non-numeric result' into 1 (Performed) or 'Other', with empty values as 0.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'surgery reports-surgery date-weekday' into numerical days (1-7) or 'Other'.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'surgery info-procedure' into numerical types (1-5) or 'Other'.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'Cesarean_Hysterectomy yes/no' as 1 if 'surgery info-procedure' is category 3 (Cesarean Hysterectomy), else 0.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'rom description-amniotic fluid color' into 0 (Clear/Bloody/No fluid) or 1 (Meconium) or 'Other'.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'rom description-membranes rupture type' into 0 (Spontaneous/Intact) or 1 (Artificial Rupture) or 'Other'.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'gbs status-gbs in urine' into 0 (Negative), 1 (Positive), or 2 (Not Tested/Mixed Growth).

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'gbs status-gbs vagina' into 0 (Negative), 1 (Positive), or 2 (Not Tested/Mixed Growth).

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'gbs diagnosis-diagnosis' into 1 (GBS Positive/Carrier) or 'Other', with empty values as 2.

name: custom_logic_operation
_description: Applies custom logic to combine GBS diagnosis and vaginal status into a single result column.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'transfer to icu-department' into 1 (ICU/Trauma) or 'Other', with empty values as 0.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'readmission-admitting department' into 1 (OBGYN), 2 (Other Medical), or 'Other', with empty values as 0.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'readmission_OBGYN_yes/no' as 1 if readmitted to OBGYN department, else 0.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'readmission_Other_yes/no' as 1 if readmitted to other medical department, else 0.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'neuraxial analgesia-anesthesia type' into 0 (No/Local/General) or 1 (Epidural/Spinal) or 'Other'.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'cs info-main indication' into numerical types (1-7) or 'Other'.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'cs info-secondary indication' into numerical types (1-7) or 'Other'.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'cs info-type of surgery' into 1 (Elective/Semi-Elective) or 3 (Urgent/Emergency) or 'Other'.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'Elective_CS_yes/no' as 1 if Cesarean Section was Elective/Semi-Elective, else 0.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'Urgent_CS_yes/no' as 1 if Cesarean Section was Urgent/Emergency, else 0.

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'hemostasis_yes/no' as 1 if hemostasis code is present, else 0.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'hemostasis-code' into 1 (Fibrillar), 2 (Nu-Knit), 3 (Surgicel) or 'Other', with empty values as 0.

name: flag_if_column_contains_any_value
_description: Flags 'misoprostol_yes/no' as 1 if 'augmentation meds-medication' contains 'MISOPROSTOL', else 0.

name: flag_if_column_contains_any_value
_description: Flags 'pitocin_yes/no' as 1 if 'augmentation meds-medication' contains 'OXYTOCIN', else 0.

name: flag_if_column_contains_any_value
_description: Flags 'propes_yes/no' as 1 if 'balloon/propes-measurement' contains 'פרופס', else 0.

name: flag_if_column_contains_any_value
_description: Flags 'balloon_yes/no' as 1 if 'balloon/propes-measurement' contains 'בלון', else 0.

name: columns_contain_nonzero_nonfalse
_description: Flags 'induction_yes/no' as 1 if either 'propes_yes/no' or 'misoprostol_yes/no' is non-zero/non-false, else 0.

name: clear_strings_multiple_columns
_description: Clears specific surgical procedure strings from 'surgical complications-procedure' column.

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'surgical_complication_yes_or_no' as 1 if 'surgical complications-procedure' is not empty, else 0.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes 'surgical complications-procedure' into GI (1), Soft Tissue (2), Urinary (3), Exploratory (4) or 'Other', with empty values as 0.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'nulliparous_yesno' as 1 if 'parity - birth number' is 1 (nulliparous), else 0.

name: filter_numbers
_description: Filters 'bmi-numeric result' to keep values between 15 and 61 (inclusive).

name: filter_numbers

name: cutoff_number
_description: Flags 'duration_of_2nd_stage_over_4h' as 1 if 'second stage length' is >= 4 hours, else 0.

params.column_name: hospitalization before delivery (hrp) - length of stay (days)

name: generate_heatmap_with_counts
_description: Generates a heatmap of organism susceptibility counts and saves it to 'heatmap.csv'.

name: concat_values_across_batches
_description: Concatenates unique antibiotic medications given across batches into a single column.

name: detect_combination_antibiotics
_description: Detects combinations of antibiotics given, flagging if 2 or more, or 3 or more unique antibiotics were administered.

name: summarize_keys_and_values_in_raw_map
_description: Summarizes unique keys and values from raw map-like data in 'scrub-all row data' and saves to 'key_value_summary.csv'.

name: categorize_packed_cells

params.before_col: packed cells before-date administered-days from reference_1
params.after_col: packed cells after-date administered-days from reference_1

_description: Categorizes packed cell transfusions (received, count before, count after) based on date references.

name: categorize_uterotonics
_description: Categorizes uterotonic administration (Cytotec, Methergin, both, or none) based on medication keywords.

name: create_column_from_value_map
_description: Flags 'uterotonics yes/no' as 1 if any uterotonics were received, else 0.

name: categorize_full_dilation
_description: Flags 'full_dilation_at_surgery_yes_or_no' as 1 if full dilation (value 10) was achieved at surgery, else 0.

name: categorize_surgery_time

columns: חדר ניתוח גניקולוגי שעת ניתוח-שעת ניתוח-value textual

_description: Categorizes surgery time into 'Day', 'Evening', or 'Night' and assigns a numeric code.

name: calculate_duration
_description: Calculates the duration of surgery in hours from start and end time columns.

name: process_length_of_stay

params.entry_col: length of stay delivery room-room enter date_1
params.exit_col: length of stay delivery room-room exit date_1

_description: Calculates the total length of the most recent continuous stay in a delivery room.

name: process_length_of_fever

params.date_col: count of fever over 38-date of measurement_1

_description: Calculates consecutive fever sequences based on temperature and date measurements.

name: imaging_guided_drainage_detected
_description: Flags imaging-guided drainage and extracts the date from reference.

name: apply_operation_on_columns

params.col1_name: hospitalization after delivery - length of stay (days)

_description: Calculates length of stay after CTI by subtracting 'first_drainage_days_from_ref' from 'hospitalization after delivery - length of stay (days)'.

name: apply_operation_on_columns

params.col1_name: hospitalization after delivery - length of stay (days)

_description: Calculates length of stay after first CT by subtracting 'imaging_ct/cti (first 10)-exam start time-days from reference_1' from 'hospitalization after delivery - length of stay (days)'.

name: add_row_index_column
_description: Adds a 'Patient_Index' column (1-based row index) to the DataFrame.

name: check_disinfection_components
_description: Checks for the presence of 3 disinfection components from various source columns and flags 'sufficient_disinfection_yes/no'.

name: find_closest_lab_value_by_datetime_batch
_description: Finds the fever value closest to CT scan time within a 12-hour window (before/after) across multiple batches.

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'Fever_at_1st_CT_yes_or_no' as 1 if a fever was recorded at the time of the first CT, else 0.

name: find_closest_lab_value_batch
_description: Finds the WBC value closest to CT scan time within a 24-hour window (before) and 12-hour window (after) across multiple batches.

name: find_closest_lab_value_batch
_description: Finds the CRP value closest to CT scan time within a 24-hour window (before) and 12-hour window (after) across multiple batches.

name: find_closest_lab_value_batch
_description: Finds the PLT value closest to CT scan time within a 24-hour window (before) and 12-hour window (after) across multiple batches.

name: flag_infectious_indication_from_free_text_batch
_description: Flags 'Imaging_OVT_Yes_No' if ovarian vein thrombosis is indicated in CT interpretation, considering negations.

name: flag_infectious_indication_from_free_text_batch
_description: Flags 'Imaging_Intestine_Yes_No' if intestinal injury is indicated in CT interpretation, considering negations.

name: flag_infectious_indication_from_free_text_batch
_description: Flags 'Imaging_ureter_Yes_No' if ureter/urinary tract injury is indicated in CT interpretation, considering negations.

name: flag_infectious_indication_from_free_text_batch
_description: Flags 'Imaging_Appendicitis_Yes_No' if appendicitis is indicated in CT interpretation, considering negations.

name: extract_sentences_containing_words_batch
_description: Extracts sentences containing 'קולקציה' or 'אבצס' from CT interpretation, considering negations.

name: flag_infectious_indication_from_free_text_batch
_description: Flags 'Imaging_Infectious_Reason' if infectious indications are present in CT interpretation, considering negations and partial matches.

name: detect_multiple_antibiotics
_description: Detects if multiple unique antibiotics (2+ or 3+) were given based on concatenated antibiotic list, handling synonyms and ignored drugs.

name: flag_antibiotic_change_due_to_growth
_description: Flags if antibiotic treatment changed following a blood culture growth, and provides debug information.

name: flag_antibiotic_change_due_to_growth
_description: Flags if antibiotic treatment changed following an other culture growth, and provides debug information.

name: concatenate_unique_batches_by_column

params.start_col: surgery after delivery-date of procedure-days from reference_1

_description: Concatenates unique postpartum surgery names from batches, deduplicating based on procedure and date.

name: update_column_with_values
_description: Categorizes postpartum surgery names into specific types (hysterectomy, drainage, GI/GU, laparotomy, laparoscopy) or 'Other'.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'postpartum_hysterectomy yes/no' as 1 if postpartum hysterectomy was performed, else 0.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'laparotomy yes/no' as 1 if laparotomy was performed, else 0.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'laparoscopy yes/no' as 1 if laparoscopy was performed, else 0.

name: columns_contain_nonzero_nonfalse
_description: Flags 'surgical_drainage_yes/no' as 1 if either laparotomy or laparoscopy was performed, else 0.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'GI or GU surgery yes/no' as 1 if GI or GU surgery was performed, else 0.

name: compare_values
_description: Flags 'soft tissue surgery yes/no' as 1 if soft tissue surgery was performed, else 0.

name: is_empty
_description: Flags 'postpartum_surgery_yes_or_no' as 1 if any postpartum surgery was performed, else 0.

name: split_gestational_age
_description: Splits 'gestational age' into 'gestational_week' and 'gestational_day' columns.

name: sum_two_columns_threshold

params.new_column_name: multiple packed cells (4 and above) yes/no

_description: Flags 'multiple packed cells (4 and above) yes/no' as 1 if total packed cells (before + after) is 4 or more, else 0.
